Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers programmes and training courses which help to promote peace within an individual, in relationships with others and globally. Specialises in work with young people aged 9 years and over, focussing on emotional health, wellbeing and dealing with stress. Also focusses on work with parents, community groups and drug rehabilitation. Offers a 2-day course for the general public. Training is available to relevant professionals. Resources include a relaxation CD and sets of affirmation cards.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
